greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = Sum_{m=0..k} (-1)^(m+k)*C(n+k,n+m)*Stirling1(n+m,m), for n>=0, 0<=k<=n.
link: A. Mansuy, Preordered forests, packed words and contraction algebras, J. Algebra 411 (2014) 259-311, section 4.4
formula: T(n,k) = (-1)^k*FF(n+k,n)*P[n,k](n/(n+1)) where P is the P-transform and FF the falling factorial function. For the definition of the P-transform see the link.
maple: for n from 0 to 6 do seq(T(n, k), k=0..n) od;
program: T = lambda n, k: sum((-1)^(m+k)*binomial(n+k, n+m)*stirling_number1(n+m, m) for m in (0..k))
for n in (0..7): print([T(n, k) for k in (0..n)])
PtransMatrix(8, lambda n: n/(n+1), lambda n, k: (-1)^k*falling_factorial(n+k,n))
xref: Cf. A269939 (Stirling2 counterpart), A268438, A032188 (row sums).
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Mar 27 2016
